title: 'Daddy hurt mommy,' No one Listens to Little Boy, then Mommy's Skull Found Buried Beside Back Yard Pool
itunes:title: 'Daddy hurt mommy,' No one Listens to Little Boy, then Mommy's Skull Found Buried Beside Back Yard Pool
description:
Bonnie Haim left her home and her 3-year-old son in 1993, never to be seen again. No arrests were made in her disappearance until a gruesome discovery was made 20 years later, right in her back yard.

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Dr. Kris Sperry: Retired Chief Medical Examiner for the State of Georgia  

Frank Powers: Assignment Manager at News 4 Jacksonville

Dr. Jolie Silva: Clinical and forensic psychologist

Wendy Patrick: Trial Attorney & author of “Red Flags”

Joseph Scott Morgan: Forensics expert, and author of “Blood Beneath My Feet”


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
